queryParameters.name: Show Deleted
queryParameters.description: boolean - true to show deleted products, false to hide them. Default: false. Only available to users with an admin role.

queryParameters.name: Show Discontinued
queryParameters.description: boolean - true to show discontinued products, false to hide them. Default: false. Only available to users with an admin role.

queryParameters.name: Id's
queryParameters.description: A comma-separated list of products ids. Specifying this parameter will display the respective products.
